step: Break down the frontend build, lint, and test step into smaller, more manageable chunks to isolate failures faster
sub_steps: Run npm install in the reactapp directory to resolve all dependencies.
Run npm run build to compile and check for build errors. If errors occur, address only build-related issues (e.g., syntax, missing modules) and retry build until it passes.
description: This step ensures dependencies are resolved and attempts to build the project, separating compilation from linting/testing to aid faster failure isolation.

step: Run linting and then execute Jest tests in the React frontend solution, isolating lint and test separately for fine-grained troubleshooting
sub_steps: Run npx eslint src/ --fix to lint and auto-fix code issues in reactapp directory. Address only linter errors if present, rerun until successful.
Run npm run test:ci to execute all Jest tests. If test failures occur, address them incrementally until all tests pass.
description: Executes linting and all test cases in independent steps for improved error analysis and targeted fixing.
